STATE v. COVINGTON No. COA06-903. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed June 19, 2007 Certification Date July 9, 2007. Appeal from Scotland (02CRS52146, 02CRS52147, 02CRS53195, 02CRS53196, 02CRS53197, 02CRS53198, 03CRS452, 03CRS453, 03CRS454, 03CRS455, 03CRS456).

Case reported without published opinion. No error.
